au.com.codeka.carrot.helpers

Class HtmlHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.codeka.carrot.helpers.HtmlHelper

  • public class HtmlHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Registered in the global Scope as "html", contains a bunch of functions you can call from your script related to HTML and HTML processing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlHelper()

    • Constructor Detail

      • HtmlHelper

        public HtmlHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • safe

        public SafeString safe(java.lang.String html)
        Mark the given string as "safe" for direct outputting.
        Parameters:
        html - The string you want to mark as safe. The string will not be escaped on output, even if Configuration.getAutoEscape() is true.
        Returns:
        A SafeString.

      • escape

        public SafeString escape(java.lang.String html)
        Escape the HTML.
        Parameters:
        html - The string you want to HTML-escape.
        Returns:
        A SafeString (so that the string doesn't get double-escaped).

      • escape

        public SafeString escape(SafeString html)
        Escape the HTML. This variant takes a SafeString, and because we already know a safe string is safe to output, we won't escape it again.
        Parameters:
        html - The string you want to HTML-escape.
        Returns:
        The SafeString you passed in.
